about_the_game:
Interactive game engine is a game development tool designed specifically for interactive video games, integrating creativity, convenience, and efficiency. It's like a magical toolbox, powerful and easy to operate. Whether you are a professional developer or a novice programmer, you can easily engage in the development of interactive video games and create your own game! You can also export your work with just one click and share your creativity with the world!

Clear and concise game logic

From plot design, uploading materials to process arrangement, it is easy to get a quick start and the process is straightforward. With the help of interactive game engine, game creation can be carried out smoothly!

Convenient and fast access to materials

Support local video import, easy to operate. You can also use the Creative Workshop to share and download a massive amount of materials for free. The obtained materials can not only be clearly viewed in your material library, but also directly embedded in the production and development process diagram for easy preview and editing.

A concise plot editing tool

Developers can use simple and intuitive storyline editing tools to build the game's story framework. Without the need for complex programming knowledge, it is as easy as playing a puzzle to combine plot nodes, character dialogues, and interactive elements, greatly shortening the development cycle and allowing more ideas to be quickly transformed into actual game content.

High quality video player

The built-in video player in the engine has rich functions such as playback, speed doubling, and capture. It can not only smoothly play and demonstrate video materials, but also present ultra high definition video game graphics, giving your game a cinematic visual effect and providing players with the ultimate visual experience. It can also achieve real-time editing of materials, greatly improving the efficiency of game development.

Free release of works for commercial use

Do you want to publish your game achievements? The software provides a work export function, and the exported packages have strong cross platform compatibility. You can easily deploy the game to multiple platforms for publishing and create revenue with creativity!

*The program is on beta version. Some functions are to be further improved.
